mapper.select: select title, start_date, end_date from tbl_event
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_event( title, start_date, end_date )VALUES( #{title}, TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_event WHERE title = #{title} AND start_date = TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND end_date = TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
